subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Logan Forsythe drove in the deciding run with a two-out single in the 12th-inning, and the visiting Tampa Bay Rays left the Yankees just a win above .500 at the midway point of the season.
snippet: Logan Forsythe drove in the deciding run with a two-out single in the 12th-inning, and the visiting Tampa Bay Rays left the Yankees just a win above .500 at the midway point of the season.
